hanzi-su-wiki:
擁

Значения

Держать в руках, обнимать; помогать, поддерживать; защищать

Мнемоника

Искажено. Трясогузка 隹 не знает страха. Зигзаг в центре — траектория её полёта. Вверху — крыша, где находится гнездо. Бросаться на врага с пустыми руками 扌, как трясогузка.

Варианты

拥
purpleculture_pinyin:
yōng
to hold; to embrace; to wrap around; to gather around (sb); to throng; to swarm; to support; Taiwan pr. [yong3]
держать; обнять; обернуть; собираться вокруг (сб); толпиться; роиться; поддерживать; Тайвань пр. [yong3]

擁護 [ yōng hù ]: to endorse; to support

heisig_chinese_memo: A mysterious turkey with human fingers wants to hug me... I will never go to Tokyo Disneyland again!
heisig_constituent: hug, finger, fingers, mysterious, top hat, cocoon, turkey
heisig_story: Fingers . . . mysterious . . . turkey. Note that the top hat is extended across both elements, though it belongs only to the cocoon. This means that you may either use mysterious - as we did here - or take the three elements separately.
koohiiStory1: A mysterious turkey with human fingers wants to hug me... I will never go to Tokyo Disneyland again!
koohiiStory2: Imagine Gandalf hugging a turkey....ouch! It bit off his finger!
WaniKani_Radicals: 扌, 亠, 幺, 隹
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Your fingers grasp this lid and when you raise it you see a poop turkey (a turkey covered in poop). You can't help yourself, you embrace the turkey.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Someone was obviously going to cook this poop turkey in a pot, and if you hadn't looked under this lid it surely would have died. Now as you embrace it you can hear the turkey weeping softly.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you embrace the sad turkey it makes a funny sound and suddenly starts pooping yogurt (よう) all over you. But you don't want to stop embracing it! It's probably just scared still. But the more you squeeze, the faster the yogurt comes out of it!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine embracing the turkey as it covers you in yogurt poo. You hope it's yogurt at least. You aren't gonna taste it to find out. Maybe. Okay you might taste it a little.
Ru_trainchinese: yōng: (глаг) поддерживать; обнимать, обхватывать руками; окружать; двигаться толпой, валить валом
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the softening (雍) hand (扌) hugs you
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The nicest way to utilize your fingers is to wrap them around someone and give them a nice warm hug.
humanum_full_description_en:
" Hold " the ancient work " 𢹬 ", from " hand ", " yong " sound, the original meaning is hug. "Shuowen": "𢹬, hug. From the hand to the sound." "Book of Rites-Yuzao": "The diligent person will accept it if he has something, and he will hold it if he walks." Kong Yingda Shu: "Hold it Yu Huaiye."

" Owned " may represent holders, Dharana. "Zhuangzi: A Journey to the North": "Shen Nong concealed his stick and laughed."

" Holding " can be extended to flock and surround. Tang Libai, "Present to Zhao Taishouyue of Xuancheng": "Three Thousand Halls entertain guests, enter and leave the plain.

" Holding " also means possessing. Han Jiayi's "Guo Qin Lun": "According to the letter of obfuscation, Qin Xiaogong supported the land of Yongzhou, and the monarchs and ministers stayed firmly to see the Zhou room.

" Owned " said protection support. "The Songs of the Chu, Nine Songs, and the Mind of the Young Master": "The long sword is eager to support the young Ai, and the sun is only suitable for the people."

" Holding " can mean gathering. "The Book of the Later Han-The Biography of Zheng Tai": "The Ming Gong embraced it, thinking it was a minion."

" Holding " also means congestion. Han Xunyue's "Han Ji-Cheng Di Ji Si": "Shu Jun Min landslide, the river is exhausted, three days against the current will pass."

" Holding " also means covering. Southern Dynasties Chen Houzhu "Longtou Water": "When the leaves fall, there is foaming, and the moving sand keeps the sky."
humanum_short_description_en: " Hold " the ancient work " 𢹬 ", from the sound of " hand " and " yong ", the original meaning is hug.
humanum_full_description:
「擁」古作「𢹬」，從「手」，「雝」聲，本義為擁抱。《說文》：「𢹬，抱也。从手雝聲。」《禮記‧玉藻》：「肆束及帶，勤者有事則收之，走則擁之。」孔穎達疏：「擁，謂抱之於懷也。」

　　「擁」可表示持、執持。《莊子‧知北游》：「神農隱几擁杖而起，嚗然放杖而笑。」

　　「擁」可引申為簇擁、環圍。唐李白〈贈宣城趙太守悅〉：「三千堂上客，出入擁平原。」

　　「擁」也表示擁有。漢賈誼《過秦論》：「秦孝公據殽函之固，擁雍州之地，君臣固守，以窺周室。」

　　「擁」還表示保護、擁護。《楚辭‧九歌‧少司命》：「竦長劍兮擁幼艾，蓀獨宜兮為民正。」

　　「擁」可指聚集。《後漢書‧鄭太傳》：「而明公擁之，以為爪牙。」

　　「擁」也指阻塞。漢荀悅《漢紀‧成帝紀四》：「蜀郡岷山崩，擁江水竭，逆流三日乃通。」

　　「擁」亦指遮蔽。南朝陳後主〈隴頭水〉：「落葉時驚沫，移沙屢擁空。」
humanum_short_description: 「擁」古作「𢹬」，從「手」，「雝」聲，本義為擁抱。

「 擁 」古作「 𢹬 」，從「 手 」，「 雝 」聲，本義為擁抱。《說文》：「𢹬，抱也。从手雝聲。」《禮記‧玉藻》：「肆束及帶，勤者有事則收之，走則擁之。」孔穎達疏：「擁，謂抱之於懷也。」 「 擁 」可表示持、執持。《莊子‧知北游》：「神農隱几擁杖而起，嚗然放杖而笑。」 「 擁 」可引申為簇擁、環圍。唐李白〈贈宣城趙太守悅〉：「三千堂上客，出入擁平原。」 「 擁 」也表示擁有。漢賈誼《過秦論》：「秦孝公據殽函之固，擁雍州之地，君臣固守，以窺周室。」 「 擁 」還表示保護、擁護。《楚辭‧九歌‧少司命》：「竦長劍兮擁幼艾，蓀獨宜兮為民正。」 「 擁 」可指聚集。《後漢書‧鄭太傳》：「而明公擁之，以為爪牙。」 「 擁 」也指阻塞。漢荀悅《漢紀‧成帝紀四》：「蜀郡岷山崩，擁江水竭，逆流三日乃通。」 「 擁 」亦指遮蔽。南朝陳後主〈隴頭水〉：「落葉時驚沫，移沙屢擁空。」
" Hold" the ancient work " 𢹬", from " hand", " yong" sound, the original meaning is hug. "Shuowen": "𢹬, hug. From the hand to the sound." "Book of Rites-Yuzao": "The diligent person will accept it if he has something, and he will hold it if he walks." Kong Yingda Shu: "Hold it Yu Huaiye." " Owned" may represent holders, Dharana. "Zhuangzi: A Journey to the North": "Shen Nong concealed his stick and laughed." " Holding" can be extended to flock and surround. Tang Libai, "Present to Zhao Taishouyue of Xuancheng": "Three Thousand Halls entertain guests, enter and leave the plain. " Holding" also means possessing. Han Jiayi's "Guo Qin Lun": "According to the letter of obfuscation, Qin Xiaogong supported the land of Yongzhou, and the monarchs and ministers stayed firmly to see the Zhou room. " Owned" said protection support. "The Songs of the Chu, Nine Songs, and the Mind of the Young Master": "The long sword is eager to support the young Ai, and the sun is only suitable for the people." " Holding" can mean gathering. "The Book of the Later Han-The Biography of Zheng Tai": "The Ming Gong embraced it, thinking it was a minion." " Holding" also means congestion. Han Xunyue's "Han Ji-Cheng Di Ji Si": "Shu Jun Min landslide, the river is exhausted, three days against the current will pass." " Holding" also means covering. Southern Dynasties Chen Houzhu "Longtou Water": "When the leaves fall, there is foaming, and the moving sand keeps the sky."

擁字的基本解释

擁
yōng
见“拥”。

擁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yōng］
［《廣韻》於隴切，上腫，影。］
［《集韻》於容切，平鍾，影。］
“拥1”的繁体字。
(1)抱；拥抱。
(2)引申为簇拥，环围。
(3)持；执持。
(4)据有，拥有。
(5)保护；拥护。
(6)聚；聚集。
(7)裹挟；推送。
(8)围裹。
(9)壅塞；阻塞。
(10)指用土或肥料堆聚在植物根部。
(11)遮蔽。
(12)积压。
(13)人群挤着走。
(14)拥护，赞成支持。参见“擁軍優屬”、“擁政愛民”。
(15)同“臃”。参見“擁腫”。

擁字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　擁； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页457第26
【唐韻】於隴切【集韻】【韻會】委勇切，?雍上聲。【說文】本作?。抱也。【禮·玉藻】肆束及帶，勤者有事，則收之，走，則擁之。【疏】肆餘也，謂束帶之餘組及帶之垂者。收謂斂持在手，擁謂抱之於懷也。【前漢·夏侯嬰傳面雍樹馳註】南方謂抱小兒爲雍樹，面偝也，雍抱持之，令面背己而抱之以馳。雍讀曰擁。　又持也。【前漢·高帝紀】太公擁彗。【註】如今卒持帚也。　又衞也，羣從也。　又【爾雅·釋言邕支載也疏】邕，又作擁。擁護支持，皆載任之義。　又【集韻】於容切，音雍。遮也。【禮·內則】女子出門，必擁蔽其面。【註】擁，猶障也。或作?。亦作?。

擁字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
擁字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yōng］
["Guangyun" cut in Long, swollen on the top, shadow. ]
["Ji Yun" Yu Rongqie, Pingzhong, Ying. ]
The traditional characters of "拥1".
(1) Hug; hug.
(2) The extension is clustered and surrounded.
(3) Hold; hold.
(4) To have, to own.
(5) Protection; support.
(6) Gather; gather.
(7) Entrapment; push.
(8) Enveloping.
(9) Congestion; obstruction.
(10) It refers to the accumulation of soil or fertilizer on the roots of plants.
(11) Shading.
(12) Backlog.
(13) The crowd squeezed.
(14) Support, agree to support. See "supporting the army and superior subordinate", "supporting the government and loving the people".
(15) Same as "Pang". See "swelling".
Hold
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji] [Hands and Words Department] 　support; Kangxi strokes: 17; page number: page 457 26
[Tang Yun] Yu Longqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] We are bravely cut, and Yong Shangsheng. [Said the text] This work?. Hug also. 【Rite·Yuzao】Wash and take carelessly, if the diligent has something, he will accept it, and if he walks, he will hold it. 【Sparse】Shuyu also refers to the remaining group of the girdle and the hanging of the belt. Suppose that you hold it in your hand, embrace it and hold it in your arms. [Previous Han·Xiahouying's handwritten face Yong Shu Chi Note] In the south, it is said that holding a child is a Yong Shu. Yong read and said to embrace.　Hold it again. [Previous Han · Gao Di Ji] Tai Gong embraced the Hui. [Note] Now the pawn also holds a broom.　You Wei Ye, Qun Cong Ye.　 [Erya · Shiyan Yong Zhi Zai Ye Shu] Yong, and embraced again. Support and support, all carry the meaning of responsibility.　[Jiyun] Yu Rongqie, Yin Yong. Cover also. [Li·NeiZe] When a woman goes out, she must cover her face. [Note] It is still a hindrance. Or for?. Also for?.

yōng
вм. 拥
Radicals: 扌, 亠, 幺, 隹  (fingers, lid, poop, turkey)
Meaning Mnemonic
Your fingers grasp this lid and when you raise it you see a poop turkey (a turkey covered in poop). You can't help yourself, you embrace the turkey.
Someone was obviously going to cook this poop turkey in a pot, and if you hadn't looked under this lid it surely would have died. Now as you embrace it you can hear the turkey weeping softly.
Reading Mnemonic
As you embrace the sad turkey it makes a funny sound and suddenly starts pooping yogurt (よう) all over you. But you don't want to stop embracing it! It's probably just scared still. But the more you squeeze, the faster the yogurt comes out of it!
Imagine embracing the turkey as it covers you in yogurt poo. You hope it's yogurt at least. You aren't gonna taste it to find out. Maybe. Okay you might taste it a little.

亠 (крышка), 扎, 隹 (старая птица)
